sourcesContent: // Main navigation elements export const mainNavElements = [ { label: 'Work', url: '/', order: '1' }, { label: 'About', url: '/about', order: '2' }, { label: 'Contact', url: '/contact', order: '3' } ]; // Footer navigation elements export const footerNavElements = [ { label: 'Twitter', url: '/#', order: '1' }, { label: 'Instagram', url: '/#', order: '2' } ]; // Portfolio elements export const portfolioElements = [ { title: 'INSPCT', id: '/inspct', type: 'Web / Branding', copy: 'This combined web and branding project was for an exciting property inspection startup app called INSPCT. I was tasked to created a logo, set of brand guidelines and a website that helped to portrey feelings of boldness, trust and to make the company appear bigger than they were at the time while avoiding traditional tropes. After an extensive period of research & development alongside regular communication with the client, I decided to make great use of white space, strong charactering and splashes of colour and shape to achieve what was expected of me. Unfortnatly, the client has recently combined the branding of this app alongside thier flagship product but and archieved version of the site can be viewed here', images: [ '/img/inspct-thumbnail.jpg', '/img/inspct-1.jpg', '/img/inspct-2.jpg', '/img/inspct-3.jpg', '/img/inspct-4.jpg', '/img/inspct-5.jpg', '/img/inspct-6.jpg', '/img/inspct-7.jpg' ] }, { title: 'Kcal Kitchen', id: '/kcal-kitchen', type: 'Web', copy: 'Initially started as a pieced together squarespace website, this client brought thier site to me with frustration at its lack of flexability and customisability. I recreated the site on a more tailor made platform and set about coding the custom features that thier business required. This included and reworked prep meal ordering system to make placing and managing orders easy for both customers as well as staff and a new affiliate system to help the company grow it\'s marketing more organicaly. The site can be viewed here', images: [ '/img/kcal-thumbnail.jpg', '/img/kcal-1.jpg', '/img/kcal-2.jpg', '/img/kcal-3.jpg', '/img/kcal-4.jpg', '/img/kcal-5.jpg', '/img/kcal-6.jpg', '/img/kcal-7.jpg' ] }, { title: 'Niche', id: '/niche', type: 'Web / Branding', copy: 'I\'ve worked with Niche over many projects and here is a collection of some of the most enjoyable and memorable designs I\'ve produced for them so far. These include the creation of the logo and advertising collateral for Niche Bazaar Studio when it launched, creating the stylishly brutalist Niche Optical Tailor website as well as learning how to design for foiled print to bring the mesmerising nature of thier angular flooring to thier marketing materials. The site can be viewed here', images: [ '/img/niche-thumbnail.jpg', '/img/niche-1.jpg', '/img/niche-2.jpg', '/img/niche-3.jpg', '/img/niche-4.jpg', '/img/niche-5.jpg', '/img/niche-6.jpg', '/img/niche-7.jpg' ] }, { title: 'CPL Software', id: '/cpl-software', type: 'Web', copy: 'Lacinia quis vel eros donec ac odio tempor orci dapibus. Dictumst quisque sagittis purus sit amet volutpat consequat mauris. Scelerisque fermentum dui faucibus in ornare quam viverra. Enim eu turpis egestas pretium aenean pharetra magna ac placerat. Lectus vestibulum mattis ullamcorper velit sed ullamcorper morbi tincidunt. Tempus egestas sed sed risus pretium. Eu turpis egestas pretium aenean pharetra magna ac placerat vestibulum.', images: [ '/img/cpl-thumbnail.jpg', '/img/cpl-1.jpg', '/img/cpl-2.jpg', '/img/cpl-3.jpg', '/img/cpl-4.jpg', '/img/cpl-5.jpg', '/img/cpl-6.jpg', '/img/cpl-7.jpg' ] }, { title: 'Incr-Edibles', id: '/incr-edibles', type: 'Web', copy: 'Incr-Edibles is a company looking to bring CBD to customers in a veriety of delicious and easy to ingest ways. This is a small startup company and as such, the budgets and time allowences were rather tight to get an fully functioning e-commerce website up and running. Thankfully, with strong communication and utilisation of automated imaging software and frontend frameworks, I was able to get this site constructed, designed and launched on schedual. !! TEST SITE STILL TO BE PUT UP !!', images: [ '/img/incr-edibles-thumbnail.jpg', '/img/incr-edibles-1.jpg', '/img/incr-edibles-2.jpg', '/img/incr-edibles-3.jpg', '/img/incr-edibles-4.jpg', '/img/incr-edibles-5.jpg', '/img/incr-edibles-6.jpg', '/img/incr-edibles-7.jpg' ] }, { title: 'Exacta Print', id: '/exacta-print', type: 'Web', copy: 'Moving from a single page website to a full catalogue of printing, design and web services offered is no small task. This was one of the longest projects I\'ve worked on but the results have been excellent. One of the key goals in this job was to cut down on time, paper work and unnessecery communication for staff when a customer wishes to place an order. Utilising extensive logic based forms and email templating, customers can now submit a fully specced order and recieve back a tailored quote without any timewasting inbetween. The site can be viewed here', images: [ '/img/exacta-thumbnail.jpg', '/img/exacta-1.jpg', '/img/exacta-2.jpg', '/img/exacta-3.jpg', '/img/exacta-4.jpg', '/img/exacta-5.jpg', '/img/exacta-6.jpg', '/img/exacta-7.jpg' ] }, { title: 'Kelvingrove Park', id: '/kelvingrove-park', type: 'Graphic', copy: 'Lacinia quis vel eros donec ac odio tempor orci dapibus.
